column5: This goes against all the fundamentals of any medical care-givers ethos. This person should not be providing care, and I can only assume you are not the first person something like this has happened to. Report the living shit out of this woman. Your feelings are valid and don’t let anyone else ever tell you otherwise. For every shit person out their there are 10 good people. Keep the head up. It’s not easy and sometimes I get low spells but it can and will get better. It’s like eating an elephant it’s just one little piece at a time.
